messages.subject: HELLO FROM FRANCE !

messages.messageBody:
Hello and Merry Christmas
,

I introduce myself, I am a French 39 years. I am passionate about the oddities and mysteries of this world. I propose you to discover my website with numerous interviews with personalities from different worlds.

You will find an interview with Axel Mazuer, for the release of his book, SHÃ”NINKI - The Authentic Ninja Handbook, available on my site :




http://www.jcgrelet.com/


Regards.



JC.GRELET

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
